title: What are the advantages of using the DVD S2? - Quora

response.answer_text: What is DVD S2? Again - be more specific in questions. People can’t answer on random something. Do you mean Panasonic S2 DVD player? Who knows what is better with it? Tabletop device, support several DVD formats, but in general nothing special in this class. Karaoke function for Japanese nerds maybe, but again - who cares.
